text: Here's the 2D array P based on the example array p = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]: 1.0 1.5 2.0 2.5 3.0 0.0 20 25 3.0 3.5 P=1]00 00 3.0 35 4.0 0.0 0.0 0.0 4.0 4.5 0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0 5.0 As you can see, the values on and above the diagonal of P are the average of the numbers in the sub-array p[¢ . . . §], while the values below the diagonal are zero.
